bow: husband told me he was taking playstation on month work trip told him no way as its our main access to netflix etc for our littles here is the email he wrote me gt dearest gt let me start by saying love you and its ok for you to be wrong below you will find the clear logical reasons that will need to take the ps4 to work trip gt will start with the most obvious entertainment when was in location for sad weeks without you all had for entertainment was my laptop now will admit that it does have multitude of capabilities however it is lacking know from experience that it just is enough the tiny screen that somehow constantly has glare no matter the level of light will give me headache the games have on it have reached the level of maximum saturation and just ca quite find the entertainment any longer when not working there wo have the benefit of set schedule …when it time to relax the playstation will fill that solidly and keep me from getting restless gt money having the playstation hooked up to the tv in my room that will be larger than this tiny laptop screen will be able to deliver vast amount of entertainment keeping me from going out to the shitty overpriced pool halls or movie theaters that proliferate any area surrounding here gt it wo be as hard back here as you think understand your biggest holdup on my taking the playstation is your doubt of the benefit to me but instead you re afraid of how difficult it might be here without it once you have your new laptop from your job we will suddenly have spare computer on our hands we can hook up either one of our laptops to the tv via hdmi or usb and keep the same amount of entertainment level the family has now the only one who uses the playstation for anything other than movies both laptops have dvd drives or netflix amazon both can be streamed through the laptop we can set up bookmark folder that would have everything your mom might need ie netflix amazon prime youtube in conclusion while it may take bit of adjustment the evidence shows that the benefit to my sanity vastly overshadows the minor and temporary inconvenience that may be caused by my taking the playstation to work gt love forever and always gt your faithful husband gt ps you re beautiful and thank you for agreeing with me *edited out personal identifying info* lol this is adorable is there any way you can get cheap dvd player to get to netflix and all that stuff while he away he comes off as arrogant and jerky but he not wrong if he the only one who plays games on it and you have other avenues to access netflix etc then it makes sense for him to take it but he should make sure the alternate hookup is set up and works reliably before he leaves he is super adorable he spent good deal of time looking up roku and amazon tv and the like yesterday which look like good alternatives to streaming and then the laptop for dvds when the ps4 is on the line he apparently gets very motivated to problem solve we have roku with netflix and pbs kids for the boys and crunchyroll and funimation for my husband and to watch anime lol and we absolutely love it it so easy to navigate and love that we can use our cell phones as remotes especially since the year old broke the actual remote my mom and mil even have the app on their phones so they can use the roku when they babysit get chromecast stream netflix from your phone 35 no subscription service needed gt he comes off as arrogant and jerky not sure why you think that instead of potentially turning it into standoff where they both think they re right he laid out his arguments acknowledged her concerns and provided possible solutions all while keeping the tone light and humorous he clearly was having fun with this and his wife obviously enjoyed it because do know him did get that his wife obviously enjoyed it thought she was posting it for advice the it ok for you to be wrong right off the bat kind of soured the tone for me guess did mean to cause offense if you get chromecast on your tv then you can stream movies from your laptop to your tv or you can even stream movies from your smart phone to your tv just thought throw that one out there look into chromecast love being able to control netflix and hulu from my phone it super easy oo chromecast we ve not looked into that one yet thanks so much easier than hooking it up every day thanks you re right shouldve explained that it was all in good fun in the post it running joke that always right because am roku et al has come down in price lot chromecast is super cheap too the upshot is it takes the stress off the playstation being on all the time we have ps4 and an apple tv we lost the apple tv remote long story and have been using the ps4 and am always concerned about it being on so much does chromecast work with iphones our old roku is going and love to get chomecast but do have an android used chrome cast while pregnant was bed ridden due to complications and had nothing to do much of the day other than sleep with the chrome cast and my phone could stream youtube netflix twitch streams and anything else straight from my phone without moving we now use it during the day with our infant when stuck nursing him and other baby related things one time purchase cost and no subscription fee beyond whatever you pay for the netflix and stuff any smartphone can connect as far as know ps you re beautiful think he saying playstation you are beautiful sure does another vote for chome cast wonderful thing too read it as scathingly sarcastic and rude email because thought at first that was reading relationships now it looks cute again we have an appletv and love it they re about 100 when we bought it years ago and they have apps for netflix hulu and bunch of others in case that appeals to you yes it does it works on both iphone and ipad and android we have roku box and love it if you use an android or iphone chromecast is great lightweight option for easily viewing netflix hulu and amazon prime on tv yes it does it works really well actually found chromecast little difficult annoying to set up but once we had it it set up it works great my only beef with it is that you ca stream apple music through it but we take it with us whenever we travel because it quick and easy way to get netflix or hulu on the big tv this is actually great idea for traveling they are pretty cheap too and easy to take on the go awesome thank you ha likely he mentions hdmi cables in his email for you but not himself he can take an hdmi cable with him if the screen is the biggest problem love our apple tv as well except for that damn remote could they have made it any smaller lost it 500 times day before finally put velcro on the back of it and velcro on the wall by the couch we actually did realize it came with one so when we bought the box we also bought another remote it handy because we move the appletv from our livingroom and my bedroom all the time so we just keep remote in each room but they re not cheap to replace roku it will change your life roku is the bomb eta also have chromecast and do like it as much so much this we ve had roku device of some sort first roku box and we switched to stick couple of years later because do know why think it had to do with us losing the damn remote and of course you ca just buy remote by itself like you can for anything else and love the crap out of that thing check out the amazon firetv stick for the price it has everything you will need http www amazon com amazon w87cun fire tv stick dp b00gdq0rmg you can use your phone as remote sorry for thinking badly of your husband am glad you pointed out that we are in relationships because that where thought we were hate his opening and closing but his reasoning is pretty convincing we actually do have anything hooked up to our tv but my old laptop and that works really well good luck we have an amazon firebox and its totally worth it you can get netflix on it plus other fun stuff also streaming netflix from laptop plugged into tv is pain laptops over heat video cards burn out etc was able to find cheap ps3 with no controllers and you can buy the dvd remote then its literally fancy bluray player netflix youtube machine think we paid 80 but it was very old this is hilarious very well written yup think that contributed to the short lifespan of the ps3 no biggie do too sometimes ha that was my counter argument thank you for the validation love my roku anytime btw just checked amazon and the fire stick is 40 worth it know but hubs got sick of us using his phone as remote gotcha we love our chromecast do you have an hdmi port on your tv get chromecast https www google com intl en us chromecast utm source=chromecast com you can also buy from walmart bestbuy target etc if you do want to wait for it to get to you 35 and it the best entertainment system in my house we do have cable with the new ones we can play spotify youtube netflix etc right to the tv so quickly if leave the room to make dinner so picks up *his* phone and casts something else *within seconds* bought one month or two ago when they released because we loved our old one and this one was faster more support etc and we just bought another and an audio one on black friday telling you buy one and you ll buy more for all the tvs in your house edit see not the only one to suggest it jumped into the chromecast line before reading the rest of the comments seriously do it op it does everything except amazon prime love our amazon fire tv super easy to use deleted tell him he got to purchase an apple tv box or you re holding the ps4 hostage no negotiations roku is good idea in the meantime :3 you can get used one pretty cheap and they do streaming from the major services ours has been lifesaver seriously you will not regret it does work with amazon streaming let me start by saying love you and its ok for you to be wrong my god that is the textbook how not to write letter letter let me start by saying you re an objective failure but this is describable problem hahaha they have store on their web site to buy the remote by itself if you have smart tv you can install the netflix app directly on your tv disregard if you do may suggest investing in roku they are amazing totally worth the get plex will save your life have both chrome cast and amazon fire stick like the fire stick much more
